original_title: Recrudescence or (To Kill an Undying Being)
overview: ‘Recrudescence’ takes place in a gothic, dystopian reality wherein a patriarchal judiciary removes the anger of women within whom it is deemed excessive. This is the case for Audrey, a writer of philosophy. But when Audrey’s husband tries to capitalise on her state, her anger returns in an unusual form...
title: Recrudescence or (To Kill an Undying Being)
